definitions.definition: A national park of the USA , located in Montana , Idaho and Wyoming .
A river that rises in the park before flowing through Wyoming , Montana and North Dakota , where it empties into the Missouri River .
A nickname for the 2-8-8-4 locomotive configuration .

main_definition: A national park of the USA , located in Montana , Idaho and Wyoming .
secondary_definitions: A river that rises in the park before flowing through Wyoming , Montana and North Dakota , where it empties into the Missouri River .
A nickname for the 2-8-8-4 locomotive configuration .
